languages.english-overview:
Word Search Puzzle game features a completely customizable template, easy integration into a current application, custom dictionaries, an easy to edit file with custom settings, puzzle length and width customization, automatic complexity settings, easy coloring and word selecting with a checker, and more.
Word Search Puzzle is released under the GNU/GPL license.

ul.li: Easy to edit file with custom settings.
Puzzle Length & Width changeable via form.
Easy coloring and word selecting w/checker.
Makesafe file to insure added dictionaries are "puzzle" safe.
